about_the_game:
Jock Studio is a Boy's Love / Yaoi Dating Simulator that features the adventures of Ace Anderson, a directionless freshman at the prestigious, all-boys sports college, Olympus Univeristy! Ace has always floated through life without meaning, but he's about to find his purpose in the most unlikely of places - the infamous Jock Studio!

Through a series of circumstances, Ace is invited to join the secretive and elusive film club, and to his surprise, it's not regular 'movies' being made - it's a porn studio featuring the sexy jocks from around the campus, soon to be known as Jock Studio!

Play through Ace's semester as a new member of the club, meeting the other actors, learning their stories and forming connections with them as they help Ace to discover his own purpose along the way. College is only a one-time experience, so help Ace make the most of it!



Meet the cast of Jock Studio, including a wide variety of characters with different personalities, backgrounds, body types and more! There are six pursuable characters, and multiple supporting cast members that Ace will meet and interact with along the way!













Jock Studio's demo features a complete, playable prologue arc of the game with multiple branching paths, allowing Ace to meet and interact with each of his potential pursuable characters in their own 'intimate' settings, discovering who they are and what their personalities are like!

The demo features hand-drawn and fully rendered art from the main game, including intricate character sprites with multiple costumes, poses and expressions, detailed background arts that bring the campus of Olympus University to life, and multiple full scene arts, featuring special character moments as well as spicy fanservice and erotic scenes!



The demo additionally features fully and partially voiced scenes with added depth and emotion from a talented vocal cast! These voice performances are paired with a captivating soundtrack featuring original compositions to be included in the full game, completing the atmosphere and helping to immerse the players in their experience!

All of these features off an engaging and captivating experience, leaving the player to eagerly anticipate unraveling the full story and setting of Jock Studio in the full release!

content_descriptors.notes:
Jock Studio's main plotline follows the character's experiences in a secretive pornographic film industry in a college setting, filming and partaking in adult films which features explicit nudity, sex, and bodily fluids.

In addition to the above, the characters will engage in various sexual scenarios, ranging from sexually explicit conversations, nudity, and eventual graphic sexual scenes.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux x86/x86_64
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6 and up
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Jock Studio Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: WIndows 7 and up
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Embark on a captivating journey in Jock Studio, a BL/Yaoi Dating Sim. Join Ace, a directionless freshman at Olympus University, as he discovers purpose in the notorious studio, defying his aimless existence. Explore college life, romance, and personal growth in this immersive adventure.
